patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the right foot to C forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a checking block D with an X-knife-hand.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Execute a low twisting kick to D with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 1.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Lower the right foot to D forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D. Perform 3 and 4 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Move the right foot to C forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a rising block with the left forearm.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Execute a low block to D with the left forearm while maintaining a left walking stance toward D. Perform 5 and 6 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Execute a high block to AD with a double arc hand while looking through it maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Turn the face toward D while forming a right bending ready stance A toward D.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Lower the left foot to AD to form a sitting stance toward AC while executing a scooping block to AC with the left palm.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Execute a middle punch to AC with the right fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward AC. Perform 9 and 10 in a connecting motion.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Execute a front strike to AC with the left back fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward AC.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Move the right foot on line AB and then move the left foot to C forming a right L-stance toward C while executing a middle guarding block to C with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Execute a low side front snap kick to C with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 12.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Lower the left foot to C forming a left low stance toward C while executing a high thrust to C with the left flat finger tip.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Execute a high thrust to C with the right flat finger tip while maintaining a left low stance toward C.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Execute a middle side piercing kick to C with the right foot while pulling both hands in the opposite direction.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Lower the right foot to C forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Move the right foot to D turning counter clockwise to form a right L-stance toward C while executing a middle guarding block to C with the forearm.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Move the left foot to D turning counter clockwise to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife-hand.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Move the left foot on line CD to form a sitting stance toward A while executing a right 9-shape block.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Move the right foot to D, turning counter-clockwise to form a left walking stance toward C while executing a low block to C with the left knife-hand.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Execute a middle turning kick to BC with the right foot and then lower it to C.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Execute a flying side piercing kick to C with the right foot. Perform 22 and 23 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Land to C to form a right walking stance toward C while executing a high vertical punch to C with a twin fist.
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Execute a high block to AC with a double arc-hand while looking through it maintaining a right walking stance toward C.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Execute an upset punch to C with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward C.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Move the right foot on line CD, forming a left walking stance toward D while striking the left palm with the right front elbow..
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Jump to D, forming a right x-stance toward BD while executing a high block to D with the right double forearm.
patternSteps.30: Step 29. Move the left foot to BC to form a sitting stance toward BD, at the same time executing a scooping block to BD with the right palm.
patternSteps.31: Step 30. Execute a middle punch to BD with the left fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward BD. Perform 29 and 30 in a connecting motion.
patternSteps.32: Step 31. Execute a front strike to BD with the right back fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward BD.
patternSteps.33: Step 32. Move the left foot to C, forming a left walking stance toward C, at the same time executing a high front strike to C with the right reverse knife-hand.
patternSteps.34: Step 33. Move the left foot to A about half a shoulder width while executing a middle turning kick to C with the right foot.
patternSteps.35: Step 34. Lower the right foot to C, and then turn counter-clockwise to form a left walking stance toward D, pivoting with the right foot while executing a high vertical punch to D with a twin fist.
patternSteps.36: Step 35. Execute a middle punch to D with the right middle knuckle fist, bringing the left side first in front of the right shoulder while forming a right L-stance toward D pulling the left foot.
patternSteps.37: Step 36. Move the right foot to D to form a sitting stance toward B, at the same time executing left 9-shape block.
patternSteps.38: Step 37. Execute a low guarding block to C with a reverse knife-hand while maintaining a sitting stance toward B.
patternSteps.39: Step 38. Execute a low guarding block to D with a knife-hand while maintaining a sitting stance toward B. Perform 37 and 38 in a continuous motion.
patternSteps.40: Step 39. Move the left foot to D in a stamping motion to form a sitting stance toward A while executing a W-shape block with the outer forearm.
patternSteps.41: Step 40. Move the left foot to C in a stamping motion to form a sitting stance toward B while executing a W-shape block with the outer forearm.
patternSteps.42: Step 41. Move the right foot to C forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a rising block with the right forearm.
patternSteps.43: Step 42. Execute a middle punch to C with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward C.
patternSteps.44: Step 43. Move the right foot on line CD forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a rising block with the left forearm.
patternSteps.45: Step 44. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.46: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
